code: import*as R from'ramda';import{FETCH_clotheS_SUCCESS,LOAD_MORE_clotheS_SUCCESS,FETCH_clotheS_BY_ID_SUCCESS}from'actionTypes';var initialState={};export default(function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var _ref=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined,type=_ref.type,payload=_ref.payload;switch(type){case FETCH_clotheS_SUCCESS:var newValues=R.indexBy(R.prop('id'),payload);return R.merge(state,newValues);case LOAD_MORE_clotheS_SUCCESS:var moreValues=R.indexBy(R.prop('id'),payload);return R.merge(state,moreValues);case FETCH_clotheS_BY_ID_SUCCESS:return R.assoc(payload.id,payload,state);}return state;});
